On Thu, 2006-09-21 at 12:22 +0000, werner.willems wrote:
> Hello Harry,
> 
> I modified the "#undef HAS_NUMERIC" to "#define HAS_NUMERIC" in the
> config.h.in file, but it did not help. Michael, did you solve the
> problem?
> 
> Regards,
> 
> Werner

no, i couldn't. i really don't think that has anything to do with python
at all. it must be one of the inclusion paths... strange thing is, i
tried to add the missing include path in the call to configure, and when
it compiled i saw it was there, but the compiler still complained... at
the moment i just don't have the time (and nerve) to dig into this.

michael
